Types

Box = object
  case kind: BoxKind
  of bxInt:
    intVal: BiggestInt
  of bxStr:
    strVal: string
  of bxFloat:
    floatVal: float
  of bxBool:
    boolVal: bool
  of bxNull:
    nil
  Source Edit
